about_the_game:
"Superior IQ" is an exciting question and answer game that will test your knowledge in an intellectual challenge. Get ready to face 160 questions divided into 4 thrilling topics, with 40 questions in each. Put your skills to the test in Mathematics, Biology, Sports, and Geography as you race against the clock.

The objective of the game is to complete the 160 questions as quickly as possible. Each question has a time limit, keeping you on the move and demanding quick and accurate decision-making. Stay attentive, think swiftly, and utilize your knowledge to answer correctly before time runs out.

With each correct answer, you will progress to the next question. But beware, a wrong answer will end the game. Maintain focus and demonstrate your intellectual superiority in every challenging question!
detailed_description:
"Superior IQ" is an exciting question and answer game that will test your knowledge in an intellectual challenge. Get ready to face 160 questions divided into 4 thrilling topics, with 40 questions in each. Put your skills to the test in Mathematics, Biology, Sports, and Geography as you race against the clock.

The objective of the game is to complete the 160 questions as quickly as possible. Each question has a time limit, keeping you on the move and demanding quick and accurate decision-making. Stay attentive, think swiftly, and utilize your knowledge to answer correctly before time runs out.

With each correct answer, you will progress to the next question. But beware, a wrong answer will end the game. Maintain focus and demonstrate your intellectual superiority in every challenging question!
name: Superior IQ Demo
short_description: "Superior IQ": Test your knowledge across 4 different topics. Answer each question quickly before time runs out. Advance and showcase your intellectual superiority in this thrilling question and answer game. Challenge your friends and dive into the educational fun now!
supported_languages:
Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
